message.content: {"given_definition_quality":25,"better_definition":"to see; to catch sight of","sentence":"我看见你。","image_prompt":"Two people in an apocalyptic but softly colored animated city street, one person waves as another walks toward them and sees them. Gentle sunlight filters through broken buildings, giving a dreamy feel. Emphasize the moment of eye contact, with animated, expressive faces. Include subtle hints of cracked sidewalks and overgrown plants, in a soft apocalypse animation style.","sentence_translation":"I see you."}
